website_summaries.verdict: Given its effective control and comfortable fit, this affordable brief is popular for everyday wear.
pros: Briefs are well-made and hold up to considerable wash and wear
Smooth finish and near-seamless fit look great under pants and skirts
High waistband is the most-loved feature, as it's comfortable and roll-free
cons: Some consumers feel the fit isn't true to size and the leg holes are tighter than expected

product_meta.title: Bali Women's One Smooth U All Over Smoothing Brief Panty
product_meta.description: This women's Bali brief features a flat waistband and breathable fabric for a feel-good, invisible fit under any ensemble.
feature_bullets: Bring seamless style to your everyday wardrobe with this Bali® One Smooth U All Around Smoothing Brief.
Nearly seamless brief in a smooth and stretchy nylon and spandex fabrication.

High-rise silhouette. Comfortable stretch waistband. Full rear coverage. Soft sewn-in gusset. Style #2361. 92% nylon, 8% spandex. Machine wash cold and tumble dry low. Imported. If you're not fully satisfied with your purchase, you are welcome to return any unworn and unwashed items with tags intact and original packaging included.
